name: NSOperation
desc: An abstract class that represents the code and data associated with a single task.

items.name: - start
items.desc: Begins the execution of the operation.

items.name: - cancel
items.desc: Advises the operation object that it should stop executing its task.

items.name: - addDependency:
items.desc: Makes the receiver dependent on the completion of the specified operation.

items.name: - removeDependency:
items.desc: Removes the receiver’s dependence on the specified operation.

items.name: - waitUntilFinished
items.desc: Blocks execution of the current thread until the operation object finishes its task.
